channel.title: Subversion – Gustavo on Software Development
channel.description: Notes from a disciplined software developer

item.title: Backing up and restoring your Subversion repository
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description: Most tutorials around show how to backup your Subversion repository: svnadmin dump /path/to/your/repository > ./repository.dump And how to restore it: mkdir /new/path/to/your/repository svnadmin create /new/path/to/your/repository svnadmin load /new/path/to/your/repository < ./repository.dump But don’t tell you what to do to solve the problem that will arise when you try to restore it: svnadmin: Dump stream contains a... Continue reading →
